TitleEnglish: My Friend's Little Sister Has It In for Me!
SummaryEnglish: For high schooler Akiteru Oboshi, the whole youthful experience thing—like fun, friendships, and even having a girlfriend—is a complete waste of time. So when his best friend’s sister, Iroha Kohinata, keeps teasing him, Akiteru naturally finds it annoying. She practically lives in his room, she’s always on his bed, she’s just a raging storm of clinginess! Why is she only annoying around him?!
Aliases: Tomodachi no Imōto ga Ore ni Dake Uzai
Tomodachi no Imouto ga Ore ni dake Uzai
My Friend’s Little Sister Is Annoying Only to Me
My Friend's Little Sister Is Annoying Only Towards Me
My friend's sister annoying only me

1.TitleEnglish: My Friend's Little Sister Has It In for Me
1.SummaryEnglish: Akiteru just wants to work toward his future, but his friend's little sister won't allow him any peace.

2.TitleEnglish: The Cousin I Haven't Seen in Years Is Cold to Me
2.SummaryEnglish: Now that Mashiro has moved to his school, can Akiteru manage to make her open up to him?

3.TitleEnglish: Only I Can Be a Pain to My Uncle’s Daughter
3.SummaryEnglish: Akiteru decides to throw a welcome party for Mashiro, but first he must convince her to attend.
